elements.label: Major Clarion
elements.description: A British officer with a youthful appearance, her eyes bearing a captivating light. She wears the ornate and exquisite uniform of the New Forces. She comes as my friend.

elements.label: Century of Strife
elements.description: The Allied officer is locked in combat with the Blade Edge-Long! [While this card is in play, the Allied officer and the Blade Edge-Long will not arrive.]

elements.label: Century of Strife
elements.description: A memory of their struggle.

elements.label: 'Radiance'
elements.description: That wolf has been taught a lesson. [The Iron Eater will no longer absorb New Forces units.]

elements.description: A failed aid attempt.

elements.label: Success
elements.description: A successful Allied advance.

elements.label: Great Malkin
elements.description: The cat and the owl are both holy to the Horned Axe. When the cat attains the wisdom of the owl - when its fur turns grey and its claws grow long and its life longer still - it is said to become one of these. It is only barely in our world, and as such we cannot touch it. But it can most certainly touch us. [This Enemy cannot be defended against, nor targeted by attacks from any source. However, killing all Légion Clavigers on the board will banish it completely.]

elements.label: Colonel Von Heiling
elements.description: War has left her scars, but it has also left her strength.

elements.label: Colonel Von Heiling
elements.description: Under the pincer attack, she revealed a weakness. This is a unique opportunity. We must use all our strength.

elements.label: Colonel Von Heiling
elements.description: Under the pincer attack, she revealed a weakness. This is a unique opportunity. We must use all our strength, once more.

slots.label: Something More?
slots.description: A knot of power? A confluence? A sign of the earth, or the sky?

elements.label: Index-Arcana
elements.description: This unit's designation never appeared in any official records of the Third Reich, but the hidden world is no stranger to these relic thieves. They rarely appear outside of ruins and sanctuaries. Why now, of all times? Why here, of all places? Perhaps our objectives align. [Enemy forces of this faction may sometimes attack other enemies as well.]

elements.label: Coordinated Assault
elements.description: Hunting in tandem. [When an enemy bearing this aspect attacks, it may trigger one additional attack from another enemy also bearing this aspect. Can trigger up to twice.]

elements.label: 地位：索隐会军官
elements.description: [要想袭击拥有这个性相的敌军需要先击杀对应的护卫]

elements.label: Bodyguard: Clockwork Lord
elements.description: This enemy unit has been commanded to protect the safety of a certain important individual. [This enemy unit protects the Clockwork Lord.]

elements.label: Clockwork Lord
elements.description: 'Descent is the beginning of another ascent. That star will illuminate a path you cannot tread—a narrow road to transcendence. I hope you possess the self-awareness to recognize how shallow your desires are compared to the journey we are about to undertake.' [The Clockwork Lord must be wounded three times before dying. While in this state, the Clockwork Lord cannot be targeted.]

elements.label: Clockwork Lord (Adjusting)
elements.description: The gears turn a little sluggishly, but this will not last long. The moment is fleeting. [While in this state, the Clockwork Lord ceases to attack. Once this ends, return to Clockwork Lord.]

elements.description: The most dangerous enemy is one that goes unanticipated.

elements.label: Jerome Alexander, Slain
elements.description: A ruthless man, who in the end received as much mercy as he gave. He sacrificed every principle he had at the altar of his own ambitions - even the affection of one who loved him.

elements.label: Lionel Saxon, Slain
elements.description: An honourable man, who I was privileged to face in battle and at last defeat. His greatest mistake was to avert his eyes from the evils of one he loved - but he made sure he fell atoning for that mistake.

elements.label: The Clockwork Lord Has Been Killed
elements.description: The madman—his delusions of grandeur have crumbled to dust along with the winding-down of his gears. The body that once so fervently preached now lies sprawled upon the ground, more a heap of twisted scrap than the 'pure one' he spent his life pursuing.

elements.label: Index-Arcana Task Force
elements.description: An elite company of the Index-Arcana. Wounds do not slow them, nor does death lie within their fears. Their strangely shaped weapons are always understood too little and used too much.

elements.label: Unknown Enemy
elements.description: The most dangerous enemy is one that goes unanticipated.

elements.label: Behemoth of Calamity
elements.description: Massive yet swift, this armored beast roams the battlefield, tracking the scent of smoke and blood. Even through its metallic shell, I can feel the palpable malevolence emanating from it.

elements.label: Unknown Enemy
elements.description: The most dangerous enemy is one that goes unanticipated.

elements.label: Goliath
elements.description: A towering warrior outfitted with heavy firepower, possessing inhuman strength capable of wrestling monsters, and a hide tough enough to withstand a hail of bullets.

elements.label: Unknown Enemy
elements.description: The most dangerous enemy is one that goes unanticipated.

elements.label: The 9th King Henry's Own Rifles
elements.description: On paper, this regiment fights for Great Britain and her Allies. But why has this column diverted from the main force? Why are they pursuing my prize? The King on the Isle is a ill-omened figure - perhaps he sees opportunity in seizing what I seek for his own ends. [Enemies of this faction will also sometimes target Enemies from the Légion du Seuil.]

elements.label: The Légion du Seuil
elements.description: A brutal army that keeps a brutal peace in the Bounds. They rarely fight their wars on this side of the dream - so why have they come? Perhaps this particular contingent has received orders to send my prize back to the sky. Perhaps something more personal is at play. [Enemies of this faction will also sometimes target Enemies from the 9th Rifles.]
